request.description: Checks if the email string is available to use.
Checks if the username string is available to use.

It creates a new user for a given login and password combination and returns a fresh token for them.

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.body: {"message":"Password does not meet the minimum requirements","errors":{"password":["Password does not meet the minimum requirements"]}}
response.name: Password not strong enough or invalid format.

request.description:
It authenticates a user for a given email and password combination and returns a fresh token for them.

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.
It logouts the user and revoke active tokens of the user.

response.name: The token trying to be revoked can't be found.

request.description:
Retrieve all passport visits entry

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 404 or 403 response code with message.

response.name: Successfully fetch a passport with visits data.

request.description:
Create a new passport visit entry for a Country

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.name: Country id try to process cannot be found!

response.body: {"message":"Country visit already exists! Please perform an update instead."}
response.name: Existing envery for visit found.

response.body: {"message":"The number of visit field is required.","errors":{"number_of_visit":["The number of visit field is required."]}}
response.name: When body params validation fails.

request.description:
Create a new passport visit entry for a POI

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.name: POI id try to process cannot be found!

response.body: {"message":"POI visit already exists! Please perform an update instead."}
response.name: Existing envery for visit found.

response.body: {"message":"The number of visit field is required.","errors":{"number_of_visit":["The number of visit field is required."]}}
response.name: When body params validation fails.

request.description:
Modify a passport visit for a POI or Country

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.name: POI id try to process cannot be found!

response.body: {"message":"The number of visit field is required.","errors":{"number_of_visit":["The number of visit field is required."]}}
response.name: When body params validation fails.

request.description:
Remove a passport visit for a POI or Country

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 400 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.name: Visit to delete cannot be found!
Visit to delete cannot be access!

request.description:
It updates the user profile for a given inputs and returns an updated state of the User.

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 422 error, and a response listing the error messages.

response.body: {"message":"The age must be a number. (and 1 more error)","errors":{"age":["The age must be a number.","The age must not have more than 3 digits."]}}{"message":"The age must be a number. (and 1 more error)","errors":{"age":["The age must be a number.","The age must not have more than 3 digits."]}}
response.name: Body request has error.

request.description:
Retrieve the user profile for a given username and returns all information about the user.

    If user is private. Username, avatar and cover image will be returned.

    Otherwise, the request will fail with a 404 error, and a response that the user was not found.

response.name: User found but profile is private.
